class_notes: Enrollment is limited to students in the QTM MS program until the August add/drop/swap period. At that time, requests for permission should be sent to the instructor, copying Graduate Program Coordinator Ria Buford (ria.buford@emory.edu).
course_description: This course provides an introduction to critical, quantitative thinking in general and an introduction to basic decision theory.
schedule_location: TTh 4pm-5:15pm in New Psyc Bldg 230 (36 Eagle Ro
